results.title: Discovery : Explore the world of oil & gas (MAC & PC)
results.brief_description: Take a first hand look at the oil and gas industry in Australia. You can visit areas such as; offshore production platforms, onshore gas and oil fields, witness the end use of gas and oil products, oil and gas reserves, processing products at the refinery, see how natural gas is created and trapped in the earth, and visit AMOSC (Australian Oil Spill Centre). There’s an historical overview, safety outline, and a chance to do some testing.

results.title: Discovering democracy: stories of democracy (PC & MAC)
results.brief_description: A comprehensive tour using print, audio, video and graphic sources through the history and basic features of democracy as a system in Australia and internationally. This CD-rom provides specifically designed pathways of directed information and interactive learning about people, events and policies in relation to the history and current manifestations of democracy. Suitable for middle and upper primary students, as well as lower and middle secondary levels. It also contains constant explanation of terms used and citations of the sources drawn from - for independent research.

results.title: Discover America
results.creator_credit: Reid H Ray and Reid Ray Films
results.brief_description: The United States from the air, mostly filmed from a helicopter. The scenes are varied - the Statue of Liberty, the Grand Canyon, the Rockies, Las Vegas, Disneyland and the volcanic Mount Pelee in Hawaii. Also shows other sites of historical interest. Excellent photography by David Butler. Narrated by Meredith Burgess.

results.title: Disciplining. Pt. 2. Reprimanding
results.brief_description: Shows several examples of correct and incorrect reprimanding of employees by supervisors. Shows how the efficiency and production in an office can be increased or decreased depending on how a situation is handled.

results.title: Discipline: Giving orders
results.brief_description: A Navy training film promoting the idea that staff discipline is the function of a co-operative management style. Includes some illuminating footage of model clerical workplaces and an involuntary endorsment of Coca-Cola.

results.title: Dinner at school
results.creator_credit: H.M. Nieter and Seven League Productions
results.brief_description: Stresses the desirability, during World War II, of a hot midday meal for school children, and shows what was done in Great Britain to make such a meal available, free of charge or at a very low cost.

results.title: Planning metrication
results.creator_credit: Stanley Marks, Stephen Cross and New Decade Productions
results.brief_description:
Episode number 1 of Series “Keys to Metrication”.
The success of metrication depends on careful planning to keep companies in step with their suppliers and customers, and to keep company departments in step with one another. How to start and organise the changeover, aspects of phasing, control and costs, staff familiarisation and training; the importance of timing and of using the opportunity for rationalisation which metrication offers to large and small concerns.

results.title: Dimensional co-ordination
results.creator_credit: A.E.C. Hopkins and Helen Wiggins Films
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Keys to Metrication”.
A film for specialised audiences to demonstrate the advantages of metrication in the building and construction industry. Standardisation of dimensional units will mean less wastage of materials, and simplicity in planning and design.

results.title: Metric production and inspection
results.creator_credit: Stanley Marks, Stephen Cross, Central Office of Information and New Decade Productions
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Keys to Metrication”.
Most imperial machines and cutting tools can be used for the production of metric sizes until they are naturally phased out and replaced by metric ones. Indexing facilities can be converted to permit metric readings. Inspectors must be equipped with sufficient metric measuring devices from the start.
